hymn.title: We rest on Thee, our Shield and our Defender

layout.singingstanza: We rest on Thee, our Shield and our De -- fend -- er; We go not forth a -- lone a -- gainst the foe; Strong in Thy strength, safe in Thy keep -- ing ten -- der. We rest on Thee, and in Thy Name we go. Strong in Thy strength, safe in Thy keep -- ing ten -- der. We rest on Thee, and in Thy Name we go.

hymn.copyright: Used and altered by permission of Marshall, Morgan & Scott, Ltd.

lyrics.stanza: Yea, in Thy Name, O Captain of salvation! In Thy dear Name, all other names above; Jesus our Righteousness, our sure Foundation, Our Prince of glory and our King of love.
We go in faith, our own great weakness feeling, And needing more each day Thy grace to know: Yet from our hearts a song of triumph pealing; We rest on Thee, and in Thy Name we go.
We rest on Thee, our Shield and our Defender: Thine is the battle, Thine shall be the praise When reigning in the Kingdom of Thy splendor; Victors, we rest with Thee, through endless days.
